title: Proper Hydration for Athletes
description: Drink at least 500ml of water 2 hours before training and sip small amounts during exercise.
author: Dr. Sarah Johnson

title: Dynamic Warm-Up Routine
description: Spend 10-15 minutes on dynamic stretches like leg swings and lunges to prevent injuries.
author: Coach Mark Davis

title: The Power of Visualization
description: Visualize successful plays before a game to boost confidence and focus.
author: Sports Psychologist Lisa Wong

title: Post-Workout Recovery Tips
description: Use foam rolling and static stretching after training to enhance recovery.
author: Physiotherapist Alex Carter
